subject: College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: All seven of Rutgers’s home games this season have sold out, the university’s athletic ticket office said. The Scarlet Knights are assured of increasing their home sellout streak to 17 straight games, the longest in the program’s history and the longest current streak in the Big East.
